articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: US, Russian Nuke Submarines Play ‘Cat & Mouse’ Game In Cuba; Reminds Of Undersea Clash During Cold War - EurAsian Times
articles.description: In reminiscent of the cat and mouse games that the US and Soviet submarines played at the peak of the Cold War, a US submarine surfaced at Guantanamo Bay a day after a Russian nuclear submarine docked at Cuba. The US Navy, apparently, was on a routine mission…
